$ gocdk help deploy
TODO more about deploy

Usage:
  gocdk deploy BIOME [flags]

Flags:
      --apply biome apply   whether to run biome apply before deploying (default true)
  -h, --help                help for deploy
      --image name[:tag]    Docker image to deploy in the form name[:tag] OR `:tag`, or empty string to build a new image (default ":latest")

$ gocdk deploy -h
TODO more about deploy

Usage:
  gocdk deploy BIOME [flags]

Flags:
      --apply biome apply   whether to run biome apply before deploying (default true)
  -h, --help                help for deploy
      --image name[:tag]    Docker image to deploy in the form name[:tag] OR `:tag`, or empty string to build a new image (default ":latest")

$ gocdk deploy --help
TODO more about deploy

Usage:
  gocdk deploy BIOME [flags]

Flags:
      --apply biome apply   whether to run biome apply before deploying (default true)
  -h, --help                help for deploy
      --image name[:tag]    Docker image to deploy in the form name[:tag] OR `:tag`, or empty string to build a new image (default ":latest")
